name: Floydkicker
description:
A little project I was working on in between Rider updates.

The longest legged participator of the game returns to face an opponent who is his complete opposite. Burly, massive, powerful. Will his agile blows be able to match Burnside's raw strength and mystical powers?

Features: New moves and revamped skills for Lenny, three difficulties, a difficult but fair fight and more of the big man.

Credits: Myself, Father Kuro for the sprites, SpecterReaper for the title image,  and everyone involved in Phone Crew and Scholar of the Wilbur sin. Check it out.
